author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: Patch 7.1 Server Maintenance Announced
text:
[ RECENT NEWS :  Warwick: The Wrath of Zaun  /  Snowdown ending 1/9  ]

Good news everyone! Server maintenance for our next patch,  Patch  7.1 , has been scheduled!

On  January 11th  at 3:00 am PT for  NA ,   5:00 UK time for  EUW , and 3:00 CET for  EUNE , servers will go down for maintenance and the  7.1  patch will be applied!

Here's   NA version  of the   Network Operations  maintenance announcement:
"On 01/11/17, starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (09:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 7.1. At 03:00 Pacific time (11:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours." Be sure to check your particular servers status page for your region's specific  7.1   maintenance times:

[ NA ,  EUW ,  EUNE ,  BR ,  TR ,  LAS ,  LAN ,  RU ,  OCE ] 
Until the official patch notes are available, check the    [ 7.1 PBE content ]   for a tentative look at what is coming in the patch - including  new skins, content for future events, and more!
